docs.snippet: The question of who will replace Derek Jeter is pushed to the background as the Yankees work to help Brian McCann transition to his new place in a new league....
docs.lead_paragraph: The question of who will replace Derek Jeter is pushed to the background as the Yankees work to help Brian McCann transition to his new place in a new league.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column; New York Yankees catcher Brian McCann, who made seven All-Star teams in nine seasons with Atlanta Braves, is trying to find his place in the American League; went 0 for 3 with a walk against Boston Red Sox and is hitting just .221.

headline.main: An Adjustment Essential to the Yankees’ Future
headline.print_headline: An Adjustment Essential to the Yankees’ Future

docs.snippet: B. J. Upton tripled and drove in two runs Sunday to lead the streaking Atlanta Braves to a 3-2 victory over the Phillies and their first four-game sweep in Philadelphia since Sept. 24 to 27, 1964....
docs.lead_paragraph: B. J. Upton tripled and drove in two runs Sunday to lead the streaking Atlanta Braves to a 3-2 victory over the Phillies and their first four-game sweep in Philadelphia since Sept. 24 to 27, 1964.
docs.abstract: Baseball Roundup; Atlanta Braves defeat Philadelphia Phillies, 3-2, to complete their first four-game sweep in Philadelphia since 1964; other MLB scores noted.

docs.snippet: An Oklahoma man who was seriously injured by a line drive during a 2006 high school baseball game isn't entitled to a nearly $1 million award from the manufacturer of the bat used to hit the ball, a federal appeals court ruled Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: An Oklahoma man who was seriously injured by a line drive during a 2006 high school baseball game isn't entitled to a nearly $1 million award from the manufacturer of the bat used to hit the ball, a federal appeals court ruled Monday.

headline.main: Court: Bat Maker Not Liable for Pitcher's Injuries
headline.print_headline: Court: Bat Maker Not Liable for Pitcher's Injuries
